functions.name: CastCadObjectToCadBitmap
functions.documentation:
Casts passed CadObject to a CadBitmap - returns a CadBitmap object to work with

obj - CadObject - Object to be cast to a CadBitmap

signature.label: CastCadObjectToCadBitmap(obj: CadObject)
signature.documentation: Casts passed CadObject to a CadBitmap - returns a CadBitmap object to work with

functions.name: CreateCircle
functions.detail: (x: number, y: number, radius: number, tolerance: number, z_value: number) → Contour
functions.documentation:
Create a Contour object for a circle consisting of 4 arcs.

x – double – x coord of centre of circle
y – double – y coord of centre of circle
radius – double – radius of circle
tolerance – double – tolerance of contour – use 0.0 for default
z_value – double – z coord for contour

signature.label: CreateCircle(x: number, y: number, radius: number, tolerance: number, z_value: number)
signature.documentation: Create a Contour object for a circle consisting of 4 arcs.

functions.name: CreateCopyOfSelectedContours
functions.detail: (smash_beziers: boolean, smash_arcs: boolean, smash_tol: number) → ContourGroup
functions.documentation:
Create a ContourGroup containing a copy of the currently selected contours in the job.

smash_beziers – bool – if true, any Bezier spans in the selection are replaced with a series of straight line spans which match the original Bezier within the specified tolerance.
smash_arc – bool – if true, any Arc spans in the selection are replaced with a series of straight line spans which match the original Arc within the specified tolerance.
smash_tol – double – tolerance (max allowed deviation) to use when approximating arcs or beziers with a series of straight lines.

signature.label: CreateCopyOfSelectedContours(smash_beziers: boolean, smash_arcs: boolean, smash_tol: number)
signature.documentation: Create a ContourGroup containing a copy of the currently selected contours in the job.

functions.name: CreateCadContour
functions.documentation:
Returns a CadContour which owns the passed Contour object.

ctr - Contour - the data which is held by the created CadContour

signature.label: CreateCadContour(ctr: Contour)
signature.documentation: Returns a CadContour which owns the passed Contour object.

functions.name: CreateCadGroup
functions.documentation:
Returns a CadContourGroup which owns the passed ContourGroup object.

ctr_group - ContourGroup - the data which is held by the created CadContourGroup

signature.label: CreateCadGroup(ctr_group: ContourGroup)
signature.documentation: Returns a CadContourGroup which owns the passed ContourGroup object.

functions.name: GetDefaultContourTolerance
functions.documentation: Returns a double value which is the default value for contour tolerances used within the program. This is usually 0.001 if working in metric or 0.00004 if working in inches.

signature.label: GetDefaultContourTolerance()
signature.documentation: Returns a double value which is the default value for contour tolerances used within the program. This is usually 0.001 if working in metric or 0.00004 if working in inches.
